alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...High based showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Otero, northwestern Baca, northeastern Las Animas and southwestern Bent Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a high based thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Higbee, or 26 miles southeast of North La Junta, moving northeast at 30 mph. Other high based showers will develop across eastern Las Animas county. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to locally 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Higbee and open country south of highway 50 and north of highway 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
